Product highlights

  • Rich in natural calcium
  • Clinically proven to help increase bone mineral density and       bone-  strengthening collagen

    Information about Zandu Seniorz Bone Strength Tablet | 100% Ayurvedic Supplement | Rich in Natural Calcium, Vitamin D3 | with Hadjod | Clinically Proven to Help Increase Bone Mineral Density & Collagen

    Zandu Seniorz Bone Strength Calc Plus Tablet is enriched with natural calcium, which helps strengthen the bones and boost collagen production. It combines extracts of asthisamhrta, ashwagandha and methi

    Key Ingredients:

  • Muktasukti bhasma
  • Extracts of asthisamhrta (cissus quadrangularis Linn.) St. 100.0 mg
  • Ashwagandha (withania somnifera dunal)
  • Methi (trigonella foenum-graecum Linn.)
  • Processed in jatiphal rasa, Excipients Q.S.
  • Colours used: Indigo carmine, tartrazine and titanium dioxide

    • Key Benefits:

  • Specially formulated for senior citizens: This BoneStrength Tablet is a part of Zandu’s new ayurvedic range of products, clinically proven and formulated especially for senior citizens. All these products have been prepared using genuine herbs certified by Zandu Foundation for healthcare

  • Helps to prevent osteoporosis: It helps provide essential nutrients like calcium, vitamin D3 and collagen that provide strength, density, and structure to bones

  • Enhances overall bone health: The BoneStrength Tablet can act as the go-to solution for getting multiple bone-related health benefits. It is useful in providing cushioning to the bones and aids in speedy recovery while also helping to prevent bones from fracture and dislocation

  • Convenient to consume and easy to swallow: It can be consumed anytime and anywhere. Thus, strengthening bone health has never been this easier. Additionally, Zandu Seniorz BoneStrength Tablet has been specially coated for easy swallowing by senior citizens

  • Natural, ayurvedic and chemical-free ingredients: Zandu Seniorz BoneStrength Tablet contains the most potent, 100% natural and ayurvedic ingredients. It also comes without any additives like salt, sugar and preservatives to give additional health-related benefits

    • Directions For Use:
    Take one tablet twice daily or as directed by the physician

    Safety Information:

  • Read the label carefully before use
  • Store in a cool and dry place, away from sunlight
  • Keep out of reach of childre
  • Close the cap tightly after every use
